website_summaries.verdict: The Asus VivoBook V500CA-DB71T is a decent, tractable laptop with a few flaws that keep it from scoring higher. Depending on your pickiness, this could be a perfectly adequate laptop for you and your family.

customer_reviews.title: LOve IT
customer_reviews.text: I searched for quite a while for a new laptop searching between tablets and laptops. I previously owned an ASUS that worked fine for several years. ASUS upgraded the sound card and the battery life in this model over my previous laptop. Very nice looking light weight computer. I seen in previous reviews something about key board issues not sure what that is all about this one is fine I have owned it for a couple months now and it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite enjoying my new laptop thus far. It's light weight, it's fast, and it's pretty easy to use. I'm still getting used to Windows 8, and the mousepad is very sensitive, so I frequently unintentionally move the mouse somewhere on the screen that I didn't intend to, but that's all part of getting used to a new computer. It doesn't have a place for a CD, but it does have a card slot on the side, which makes it easy to upload pictures from my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: awesome laptop
customer_reviews.text: first thing I did was put in an SSD and wow this is a fast unit. touch screen is nice. the whole laptop seems very sturdy. windows 8 becomes usable when startisback is installed.
customer_reviews.author: leibnitz

customer_reviews.title: great laptop at the price
customer_reviews.text: okay here are the pros and cons pros: 1. intel 4000 HD graphics card 2. when you register your device your get a 1 year protection plan from basically everything 3.I7 processor 4. under 1000 dollars 5. touch screen cons: 1. windows 8 2. dealing with amazon 3. no CD Rom overall good buy works great with gaming and computer drafting
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Not awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I've had to reinstall my OS several times, the touch screen randomly stops working, and the screen is so thin it sometimes gets something I can best describe as bubbles in it from deflection. They go away after a while but yeah. Not great. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: hngonagstrng

customer_reviews.title: good laptop for daily tasks
customer_reviews.text: i like the finished of the laptop and the processor and memory have a really good performance; and the price its lower comparing with other models in the market the only complaint its the battery duration and the hard disk; i actually replace it with a 750 gb SSD. i recommend this laptop if you use it from home and don't have problem with the 4 hours battery duration; its not useful for use it in long trips or long meeting with out power adapter
customer_reviews.author: lombardo

customer_reviews.title: good lapto
customer_reviews.text: very good laptop, just windows gives a little trouble when charging it, you can solve it via youtube with a simple video that explains how to remove the trouble, great resolution and very good price for what you receive
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Pallares

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and works perfectly. It's really fast and better than what I was expecting. The price was also great.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I have not done my review sooner. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: woodyhennegg

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, i have it for play WOW everyday for 5 hours or more and works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: broken twice in half year but works fine now after sending back to the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product! Its everything shown in the amazon page. I really like it a lot. ...I recomend it. Excellent gift
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Ariza

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had to send 3 of them back because the 1st one had rattling inside of it and the other 2 had keys sticking. I dnt blame amazon because I think its ASUS fault for not checking their items before packaging them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Computer, Works perfectly I think..
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly... FIrst PC in a long ass time... way cheaper and better value than macbook... trust me i took forever 2 decide.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: Most components of the computer worked fine with exception of wireless hardware. One can't live without wireless . So it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Brokaw

customer_reviews.title: Screen started to open at the top
customer_reviews.text: The hardware of the screen started to come apart within 3 weeks of using this product. The glass started to unstick from the monitor panel at the top edge.
customer_reviews.author: Belize Trade and Investment

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing-Bad space bar.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this laptop. High expectations. then I started setting it up and fount it to be glitchy. The screen would change to another screen while typing in form fields. It seemed slower than I expected as well (its an i7). Then when I was starting to type things that were more than one word in length I found that the space bar only worked about half of the time. I don't know how anyone could work with this kind of issue. After discovering this problem I found, online, that others have experienced the same problem with their ASUS laptops. I'm glad I purchased it from a reputable company that I could return it to.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was absolutely perfect for my needs. It has enough power/memory for me to complete computational intensive programs with no fuss. It does take some getting used to when typing as the narrow width seems sharper on the forearms. The screen resolution is amazing. People looking at it remark on how clear it is. It has a great weight and the metal casing makes it seem more durable. However, it is prone to finger smudges.
customer_reviews.author: izz

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: have yet to tap into it ,it's very fast ask me again in 6 months , windows 8 touch screen needs some work ! has plus's and negatives ,
customer_reviews.author: Trixter808

customer_reviews.title: Really Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -The specs are awesome for heavy users. Its fast and the touch screen is really impressive. -Its light and thin which is kinda the point of using a laptop. Cons -It gets a lot of fingerprint streaks since its a touch screen but you can just do what i did and get an anti-scratch screen protector for like $8. -The battery life is kind of short. I get about 3 hours of watching shows, coding and general surfing. I don't game on it though. Overall I love it. As a software developer, I spend a lot of time on my laptop and I can definitely say this laptop is worth the money you pay for it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sentinel

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for colledge student in engineering.
customer_reviews.text: She said she Loved it, met her expectations as well. She has been using ASUS computers for school and personal life for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R. Butts

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work properly and the bluetooth does not work!
customer_reviews.author: Rita C.

customer_reviews.title: good laptop
customer_reviews.text: web cam quality is bad,as well as pictures taken with it set up and touch screen is perfect quiet and fast, pretty light
customer_reviews.author: Bagira5

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: excellent!!! it's perfect for me, i'm a designer and it is all i need for my work. it's thin and powerful
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Fournier

customer_reviews.title: great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I'm digging my new asus. Among other things, I use it to record music. Such an upgrade from my netbook I had since 2010.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is fantastic, fast, amazing and works great! I really recommend it to buy, the best way to invert money!
customer_reviews.author: Greivin Arias

customer_reviews.title: REPLY
customer_reviews.text: JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOUR...WILL RECOMEND IT TO MY FRIENDS..THANK YOU...THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK Y,ALL .... HAVE A NICE FOR EVER.....
customer_reviews.author: Williamc Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Liar !!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered was a notebook with an I7-4500 CPU and 1TB hard drive and instead I got a I7-3537 CPU with a 500GB hard drive. Liar !!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Rungruj

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with my new computer, not start correctly, this problem is recurrent, I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent purchase, i love it, i'm using it to simulate adn develope androids appp, runs perfect and blablabla, BUT, in the descriptions says that it comes with an 8GB RAM and the one i got, has only 6GB, i can't return it because i'm outside USA.
customer_reviews.author: Maridelia Esteves

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this laptop. It's perfect for everything I need. I love the look and the portability of it and the touch screen just brings it home. It has everything I need and although windows 8 is hard to adjust to I really cannot complain about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie P.

product_meta.title: ASUS V500CA 15-Inch Laptop (OLD VERSION)
product_meta.description:
Silver Aluminum/Touch Screen/15.6" HD (1366*768) LED with Touch/Intel Core i7-4500U (2.7GHz)/8 GB (two slots, both slots filled with a 4 GB stick)/Intel® GMA HD/1TB 5400RPM HDD/DL DVD+/-RW/CD-RW/Windows 8 (64bit)/802.11BGN/HD Camera/Bluetooth 4.0/50WHrs, 4500mAh, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion polymer Battery Pack with up to 5 hours life/Numeric Keypad, Chiclet Style
